name: Cubic Seeds
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add 3 "Vijam the Cubic Seed" to your Deck. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck/Extra Deck that contains no monsters other than "Cubic" monsters. In addition, the number of Spell/Trap Cards that are not "Cubic" cards must be 6 or lower.
